about.title: About Me
about.bio_p1: I'm a <1>Belgian software engineering student</1> with a passion that grew from hobbyist Python coding into a professional career path. What started as solving LeetCode problems for fun led me to pursue an associate's degree at Howest, where I graduated <3>with high honors</3>.
about.bio_p2: Currently further expanding my skills with a Bachelor of Applied Computer Science specializing in software engineering, I'm balancing academic projects with personal ventures like building this website. When I'm not coding, you'll find me <1>learning Japanese N4</1>, hiking the Belgian countryside, or capturing moments through photography.
about.bio_p3: I'm actively working toward my goal of a <1>Tokyo internship in 2027</1>, with plans to relocate permanently to Saitama after graduation. I believe in blending technical precision with creative expression, whether I'm debugging code or composing the perfect picture.
